channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024060490
item.description:
Report X-2024060490

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-12T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-28
  • City: SPRINGFIELD
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING SORTING OF SMALL PACKAGES OUR SMALLS SORTER HEARD A RATTLING SOUND FROM THIS PACKAGE, SET IT ASIDE AND NOTIFIED A HAZMAT AUDITOR. UPON INSPECTION THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND TO CONTAIN 8 SPRAY CANS OF HAIR COLOR. PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED AS AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT.

item.title: Report X-2024051766
item.description:
Report X-2024051766

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-12T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-23
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND BY RESPONDER IN DOOR 156. THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKED ON BY ANOTHER PACKAGE AND WAS NOT ITSELF LEAKING. IN ORDER TO VERIFY THAT THE PACKAGE WAS NOT LEAKING, THE CONTENTS HAD TO BE CHECKED. CHECKING THE CONTENTS REVEALED THAT A POTENTIAL UNDECLARED HAZMAT WAS PRESENT IN THE BOX (THE INNER MERCHANDISE BOXES WERE MARKED WITH LIMITED QUANTITY DIAMONDS). PACKAGE WAS PLACED ON HOLD.

item.title: Report X-2024060149
item.description:
Report X-2024060149

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE FOUND AND A CALL MADE TO PSC FOR CLEAN UP. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE SMALL PACKAGE DECSCION TREE AND DONNED PPE. PACKAGE AND RELATED DEBRIS WERE BROUGHT TO THE PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
